【考法 1】 n. 申请,请求：an application (as to a recognized authority) for corroboration, vindication, or decision
【例】A piteous['pɪtɪəs]虔诚 appeal for help.
【例】to make an appeal to the public to donate needed blood 向公众提出献血请求
【近】adjuration, conjuration, entreaty, petition, pleading, supplication
【考法 2】 n. 起诉 to charge with a crime : accuse
【例】My lawyer said the court's decision wasn't correct and that we should file for an appeal. 我的律师说法庭的判决不对我们应该起诉。
【近】charge, accuse, incriminate, inculpate, indict
【反】absolve 赦免；exonerate, exculpate 开脱免罪；vindicate 辩护
【记】 ap + peal 钟响声，撞钟,一是为了诉求,二是为了引人注意；apply申请，接近要求呼吁的意思
【另】 peal 响亮的钟声, repeal 撤销 (appeal的反意), appellant(上诉人)，application 请求, 申请应用,应用程序,应用软件
